raw_result.Analysis Notes: The search results contained a variety of links related to Wrexham County Borough Council services. Although some links were more specific than others, all provided potential value for users seeking information on council customer services.
raw_result.Recommendations Notes: The top recommendations are in order of relevance and quality for the given instruction, with the first recommendation being the most confidently relevant option.
